languages.text:
"Что есть подмостки сцены без актеров?
Лишь груда бестолковой древесины!
Пока апофеоз не прогремит,
Товарищам твоим найдется роль.
Купец Бездомный, я тебя услышал".

traits.locale_text:
"Что есть подмостки сцены без актеров?
Лишь груда бестолковой древесины!
Пока апофеоз не прогремит,
Товарищам твоим найдется роль.
Купец Бездомный, я тебя услышал".
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"What is a stage when actors do not tread?
Naught but a pile of pointless wood, that's what!
Before the culmination thunders past,
Your friends will find a part to play, fear not,
Your words I've heard, my Merchant Vagabond."
languages.original_text:
"Что есть подмостки сцены без актеров?
Лишь груда бестолковой древесины!
Пока апофеоз не прогремит,

languages.text:
“失去了演员的踏踩，舞台意义何在？
毫无疑问，不过是毫无意义的木材！
不必惧怕，高潮必将如雷鸣而来。
你的朋友们也将找到各自的舞台。
四处漂泊的商人啊，我已经听到了你的话语。”
languages.original_text:
"What is a stage when actors do not tread?
Naught but a pile of pointless wood, that's what!
Before the culmination thunders past,
Your friends will find a part to play, fear not,
Your words I've heard, my Merchant Vagabond."

“失去了演员的踏踩，舞台意义何在？

你的朋友们也将找到各自的舞台。
四处漂泊的商人啊，我已经听到了你的话语。”
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
«¿Qué es un escenario sin actores a su espalda?
¡Nada más que un insulso montón de madera!
Antes de que la culminación dé paso a la calma,
tus amigos encontrarán en papel que representan.
Tus palabras he entendido, Mercader Errante».
languages.original_text:
"What is a stage when actors do not tread?
Naught but a pile of pointless wood, that's what!
Before the culmination thunders past,
Your friends will find a part to play, fear not,
Your words I've heard, my Merchant Vagabond."

traits.locale_text:
«¿Qué es un escenario sin actores a su espalda?
¡Nada más que un insulso montón de madera!
Antes de que la culminación dé paso a la calma,
tus amigos encontrarán en papel que representan.
Tus palabras he entendido, Mercader Errante».
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
「役者が踏まない舞台とは何だろう？
無意味な材木の束にすぎない！
最高潮が過ぎる前に
君の友人は役を演じ切るだろう
放浪せし商人よ、君の言葉はしかと聞いた」
languages.original_text:
"What is a stage when actors do not tread?
Naught but a pile of pointless wood, that's what!
Before the culmination thunders past,
Your friends will find a part to play, fear not,
Your words I've heard, my Merchant Vagabond."

traits.locale_text:
「役者が踏まない舞台とは何だろう？

最高潮が過ぎる前に
君の友人は役を演じ切るだろう
放浪せし商人よ、君の言葉はしかと聞いた」
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Was ist eine Bühne ohne Spieler?
Nur ein Haufen Holz ohne jeden Sinn!
Bevor der Höhepunkt gedonnert kommt,
finden eine Rolle Eure Freunde.
Ihr wart gehört, mein Händlervagabund."
languages.original_text:
"What is a stage when actors do not tread?
Naught but a pile of pointless wood, that's what!
Before the culmination thunders past,
Your friends will find a part to play, fear not,
Your words I've heard, my Merchant Vagabond."

traits.locale_text:

Nur ein Haufen Holz ohne jeden Sinn!

finden eine Rolle Eure Freunde.
Ihr wart gehört, mein Händlervagabund."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
« Qu'est-ce qu'une scène sans acteurs pour l'arpenter ?
Rien qu'un tas de planches inutiles, voilà quoi !
Avant que ne soit franchi le plus haut sommet,
Vos amis trouveront un rôle à jouer, croyez-moi.
{mf|Mon Marchand Vagabond|Ma Marchande Vagabonde}, vos mots sont bien notés. »
languages.original_text:
"What is a stage when actors do not tread?
Naught but a pile of pointless wood, that's what!
Before the culmination thunders past,
Your friends will find a part to play, fear not,
Your words I've heard, my Merchant Vagabond."

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Aktörlerin arşınlayamadığı sahneyi ben neyleyim?
İşe yaramaz bir ahşap parçası bu, söyle gözünü seveyim!
Finale gelip kapanmadan önce perde,
Dostlarına rol buluruz sahnede.
Pek Berduş Tüccar, anladım seni de."
languages.original_text:
"What is a stage when actors do not tread?
Naught but a pile of pointless wood, that's what!
Before the culmination thunders past,
Your friends will find a part to play, fear not,
Your words I've heard, my Merchant Vagabond."

traits.locale_text:
"Aktörlerin arşınlayamadığı sahneyi ben neyleyim?
İşe yaramaz bir ahşap parçası bu, söyle gözünü seveyim!
Finale gelip kapanmadan önce perde,
Dostlarına rol buluruz sahnede.
Sevgili Berduş Tüccar, anladım seni de."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle
